Gmail
For companies Connection Create an account

Secure, intelligent and easy-to-use messaging

Gain efficiency with Gmail, which now includes Google Chat, Google Meet, and other tools.

Create an account For companies

Secure and private messaging, under your control.

Your Gmail content is never used for advertising purposes

Gmail encrypts all your messages, received and sent, using state-of-the-art encryption. Your content in Gmail is never used for the purpose of personalizing ads.

Every day, Gmail protects the mail of more than a billion users

Gmail prevents 99.9% of spam, malware, and dangerous links from reaching your inbox.

The most advanced protections against phishing

When you receive a suspicious email that might be legitimate, Gmail notifies you and lets you decide.

Advanced control over sent emails

Confidential mode lets you set expiration dates and ask recipients to validate their identity via SMS. You can also remove the transfer, copy, download and print options.
